column5: I think the title tells all.   And while I'm at it Merry Christmas to all OFC'ers !!!!!!!!!!!!!!
happy happy Gerritt, hope it's a great Birthday!  Maureen
Happy Birthday to you and The happiest of Christmasses to you and yours Gerritt!
....Oh my oh my, another year closer to wiser.    Happy B'day Bud, we'll talk later.
Happy birthday and a very Merry Christmas to you and your family! All the best....
Hey G! Happy birthday dude... when we going for a beer?
So ... you only get half the birthday presents or half the Christmas gifts.  Bummer. Hope you have a great one.
Happy Birthday Gerritt....
Best to Gerritt and family!
Happy Birthday Gerritt.  Have a great day and a Merry Christmas.  Joey
Happy Birthday Gerritt,
Have a great Birthday Bud! Did you ask for ratchet straps for your birthday or for Christmas ?
Merry Burfday FF#2.  I know, how original.
Happy birthday Gerrit, and a gret 08. Mark
Wow...hope you have a great day G!!!  Happy Birthday buddy!
WOW...There is so much celebration going on !!!    HAPPY BIRTHDAY GERRITT       And MERRY CHRISTMAS & HAPPY NEW YEAR !!!!!!!!..  ..i hope santa is good to you as well..
Merry Brithday........or is it Happy Christmas?  Either way, have a great day  Sinker
Best fishes, Happy Birthday, and Merry Christmas!!!   I hope both you and Corey get those AB-Flexes y'all are wishin' for!

Thanks for all the well wishes guys n' gals.... Yap tomorrow I will be 32... please tell me it does not go down hill from here... as I am feeling kinda old... dunno why.. but my hearing and eye sight aint what it used to be... and I am already getting up in the middle of the night to pee.... please tell me it gets better!!! PLEASE!!!  Merry Christmas everyone.. and I wish each OFC'r the very best life has to offer in 2008!   Gerritt & Family.

Well its just going to change Gerritt I pee at night but I usually down a litre of water 2 to 3 hrs before bed and I am only a decade a head of you.Happy Birthday kiddo.Give Liam a great big hug and make his Christmas a memorable day.Won't be long and he will be riding long days with you in the boat and then you will be grey haired like me.MTP
Hey, it's not just me that's a Christmas baby!!! Happy b-day bud!! I've got 5 years on ya!! I'll be 37 tomorrow and let me tell ya, it does only get worse!!! RLOL All the best everyone!!
merry birthday to you putz. Alls it means is you get 1/2 as many presents as the other kids.   Art
